name: 087-B: REBORN
description:
How far can YOU go.

087-B Reborn is a small remake of Regalis' SCP-087-B game that I made in about a week. This version, however, incorporates much more than what the original game had. New NPCs, rooms, events, a full overhaul on graphics, and even a special ending if you can get that far to reach it!

I'm not going to cover too much information about the game, as I believe that it should be found through experience and not spoiled beforehand. 

Since it was developed over a week, I expect bugs or other glitches in the game. If you see something, comment it and I will look into it.
